briefdescription.para: Align to left side of symbol.
Align to horizontal center of symbol.

Align to top of symbol.

Returns the rotation angle for the marker, in degrees clockwise from north.
Returns the approximate bounding box of the marker symbol layer, taking into account any data defined overrides and offsets which are set for the marker layer.

simplesect.para: approximate symbol bounds, in painter units

briefdescription.para: Returns the horizontal anchor point for positioning the symbol.

detaileddescription.para:
The symbol will be drawn so that the horizontal anchor point is aligned with the marker's desired location.
setHorizontalAnchorPoint()
verticalAnchorPoint()

briefdescription.para: Returns the marker's offset, which is the horizontal and vertical displacement which the rendered marker will have from the original feature's geometry.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are specified by offsetUnit().
setOffset()
offsetUnit()
offsetMapUnitScale()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale for the symbol's offset.
Returns the units for the symbol's offset.
Returns the units to use for sizes and widths within the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Individual symbol layer subclasses will interpret this in different ways, e.g., a marker symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the marker size, while a line symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the line width.
output unit, or QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnknownUnit if the symbol layer contains mixed units
setOutputUnit()

briefdescription.para: Renders a marker at the specified point.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must implement this to handle drawing the point.
point
position at which to render point, in painter units
context
symbol render context

briefdescription.para: Returns the method to use for scaling the marker's size.
Sets the rotation angle for the marker.

parameterdescription.para: angle in degrees clockwise from north.

briefdescription.para: Sets the horizontal anchor point for positioning the symbol.

parameterdescription.para: anchor point. Symbol will be drawn so that the horizontal anchor point is aligned with the marker's desired location.

briefdescription.para: Sets the line angle modification for the symbol's angle.

detaileddescription.para:
This angle is added to the marker's rotation and data defined rotation before rendering the symbol, and is usually used for orienting symbols to match a line's angle.
lineAngle
Angle in degrees clockwise from north, valid values are between 0 and 360
setAngle()
angle()
QGIS 2.9

briefdescription.para: Sets the marker's offset, which is the horizontal and vertical displacement which the rendered marker should have from the original feature's geometry.

parameterdescription.para: marker offset. Units are specified by offsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale for the symbol's offset.
Sets the units for the symbol's offset.
Sets the units to use for sizes and widths within the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Individual symbol layer subclasses will interpret this in different ways, e.g., a marker symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the marker size, while a line symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the line width.
unit
output units
outputUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the method to use for scaling the marker's size.
Sets the symbol size.

parameterdescription.para: symbol size. Units are specified by sizeUnit().

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale for the symbol's size.
Sets the units for the symbol's size.
Sets the vertical anchor point for positioning the symbol.

parameterdescription.para: anchor point. Symbol will be drawn so that the vertical anchor point is aligned with the marker's desired location.

briefdescription.para: Returns the symbol size.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are specified by sizeUnit().
setSize()
sizeUnit()
sizeMapUnitScale()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale for the symbol's size.
Returns the units for the symbol's size.
Returns the vertical anchor point for positioning the symbol.

detaileddescription.para:
The symbol will be drawn so that the vertical anchor point is aligned with the marker's desired location.
setVerticalAnchorPoint()
horizontalAnchorPoint()

briefdescription.para: Writes the symbol layer definition as a SLD XML element.
Constructor for QgsMarkerSymbolLayer.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to lock symbol color

briefdescription.para: Calculates the required marker offset, including both the symbol offset and any displacement required to align with the marker's anchor point.

parameterdescription.para: will be set to required horizontal offset (in painter units)
will be set to required vertical offset (in painter units)

memberdef.argsstring: (QgsSymbolRenderContext &context, double width, double height, double &offsetX, double &offsetY) const

briefdescription.para: Calculates the required marker offset, including both the symbol offset and any displacement required to align with the marker's anchor point.

parameterdescription.para: will be set to required horizontal offset (in painter units)
will be set to required vertical offset (in painter units)

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for marker symbol layers.
